title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client/SDK for Ollama, published on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) for using Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to the local Ollama API; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built Go CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for easier model ops.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as GitHub-Copilot-like suggestions.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama models (Rust+React).

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for QA & RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Python template for building RAG apps with Ollama + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using your local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama containers inside CI pipelines for testing LLM code.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with streaming chat completion support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that forwards channel messages to a local Ollama model and posts replies.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for querying local Ollama models from within your notes.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Alternative Rust client focused on minimal dependencies and WASM compatibility.
